effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Templar's Verdict and Divine Storm by 2% stacking up to 10 times. Spending Holy Power on damaging abilities has a 12% chance to remove Winning Streak!
Set: When you lose your Winning Streak! you get the last Holy Power spent back, you cannot lose Holy Power for the next 4.0 sec, and the damage of your Holy Power abilities are increased by 10%.

name: Test Subject's Clasps
description: Don't take 'em off - might need to identify your body.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,665 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 202 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 373 Strength up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 93,491 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 140,244.
Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,692 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Crucible Raider's Shadowed Ultra Greatsword

spells.description: Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
